mapper.sql: plan_info_detail_id, plan_id, prod_norm, prod_level, prod_length, prod_weight, prod_num, plan_output_volume, plan_finist_date, collected_units, plan_dyz, prod_inputuser, crt_date, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bsl_make_plan_info_detail
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bsl_make_plan_info_detail (plan_info_detail_id, plan_id, prod_norm, prod_level, prod_length, prod_weight, prod_num, plan_output_volume, plan_finist_date, collected_units, plan_dyz, prod_inputuser, crt_date, remark) values (#{planInfoDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planOutputVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planFinistDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{collectedUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planDyz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bsl_make_plan_info_detail
plan_info_detail_id = #{record.planInfoDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_id = #{record.planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_norm = #{record.prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_level = #{record.prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_length = #{record.prodLength,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_weight = #{record.prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL},

update bsl_make_plan_info_detail set plan_info_detail_id = #{record.planInfoDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_id = #{record.planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_norm = #{record.prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_level = #{record.prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_length = #{record.prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_weight = #{record.prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_num = #{record.prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_output_volume = #{record.planOutputVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_finist_date = #{record.planFinistDate,jdbcType=DATE}, collected_units = #{record.collectedUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_dyz = #{record.planDyz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_inputuser = #{record.prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_date = #{record.crtDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bsl_make_plan_info_detail
plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_norm = #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_level = #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
prod_length = #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_weight = #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_num = #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_output_volume = #{planOutputVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_finist_date = #{planFinistDate,jdbcType=DATE},
collected_units = #{collectedUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_dyz = #{planDyz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prod_inputuser = #{prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crt_date = #{crtDate,jdbcType=DATE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where plan_info_detail_id = #{planInfoDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bsl_make_plan_info_detail set plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_norm = #{prodNorm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_level = #{prodLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, prod_length = #{prodLength,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_weight = #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_num = #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_output_volume = #{planOutputVolume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_finist_date = #{planFinistDate,jdbcType=DATE}, collected_units = #{collectedUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_dyz = #{planDyz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prod_inputuser = #{prodInputuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crt_date = #{crtDate,jdbcType=DATE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where plan_info_detail_id = #{planInfoDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.plan_info_detail_id, a.plan_id, a.prod_norm, a.prod_level, a.prod_length, a.prod_weight, a.prod_num, a.plan_output_volume, a.plan_finist_date, a.collected_units, a.plan_dyz, a.prod_inputuser, a.crt_date, a.remark, c.prod_make_weight from bsl_make_plan_info_detail a left join ( select b.prod_plan_no, b.prod_norm, b.prod_length, sum(b.prod_rel_weight) prod_make_weight from bsl_product_info b where b.prod_dcl_flag = '0' group by b.prod_plan_no,b.prod_norm,b.prod_length) c on a.plan_id = c.prod_plan_no and a.prod_norm = c.prod_norm and a.prod_length = c.prod_length where a.plan_info_detail_id like 'X%' and a.plan_id = #{planId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.crt_date desc
